entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
